name: LOR - League of Runners
description: You will fight for the title of best runner in a beautiful fantasy world. You will need to pick up the scope to activate the portal and enter it. The main task - to pass as quickly as possible given the track.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad-core, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
